comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:6.0.2) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/6.0.2
Build ID: 20110902133214

Steps to reproduce:

After a group is closed manually during shutdown and later when you restore the group, the URL field does not show the address of the restored sites. It is blank. The only way the URL will appear is to open a new tab and close it. Only then will the URL appear. This procedure has to be done for each URL in the group so that when you right click on the icon on the bottom line it will display all the URL addresses in the group 


Actual results:

In a group URL field is always blank after a restore operation


Expected results:

The URLs should appear for each site in the group after a restore of FireFox

comments.raw_text:
Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:9.0a1) Gecko/20110921 Firefox/9.0a1

Reporter, please can you confirm whether this issue is still reproducible when you start Firefox in safe mode or with a clean profile?http://support.mozilla.com/kb/Safe+Mode http://support.mozilla.com/kb/Basic+Troubleshooting#w_8-make-a-new-profile

comments.text: The safe mode makes the problem go away. So it may be some of my add-ons but I do not know which one yet.
